Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to bicycles used for certain commercial purposes.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the posting of signs setting forth bicycle safety procedures at the place of employment of businesses that engage in delivering packages, parcels, papers or articles of any type by bicycle.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Businesses that use bicycle operators and delivery services post signs at the place of employment detailing proper bicycle safety procedures.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to bicycles used for certain commercial purposes.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the posting of signs setting forth bicycle safety procedures at the place of employment of businesses that engage in delivering packages, parcels, papers or articles of any type by bicycle.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Businesses that use bicycle operators and delivery services post signs at the place of employment detailing proper bicycle safety procedures.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Brewer and Gerson
